name: AssetRelay
overview:
AssetRelay was created as a division of Simbol Test Systems Inc. in 2002 to offer companies used test equipment solutions instead of over priced new items. Since then, they have moved into their own building, established many long term connections with local and worldwide companies and became a major player in the world of used optical equipment.

In 2007, AsseRelay helped with the launch of a new division of Simbol Test Systems named Photoncom who specializes in the repair and calibration of Fiber Optic Test Equipment and other types of equipment.

Today AssetRelay is an internationally known company with one of the biggest Used Optical Test Equipment inventories in the world, one of the most competitive repair and calibration labs out there and is the Internet’s one stop shop for all used and refurbished Optical Test Equipment.
